entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 36.
